mapper.select: select sa.id,sa.name,count(article_id) as quantity from sys_article_detail as sad,sys_article as sa where sad.article_id = sa.id and sad.status = 1 GROUP BY sad.article_id

select sab.*,sa.name,sad.code from sys_article_borrow as sab,sys_article_detail as sad,sys_article as sa where sab.article_detail_id = sad.id and sad.article_id = sa.id and sab.create_id = #{id} ORDER BY sab.create_date DESC
mapper.update: update sys_article_borrow set status = 2 where id = #{articleBorrowId} and create_id = #{id}
